Interface NetworkConnector

All Known Implementing Classes:
SocketConnector
public interface NetworkConnector
Defines a low-level abstraction for network communication between the game client and the server.

Implementations of this interface are responsible for managing the connection lifecycle, sending commands, and delivering messages received from the server to registered listeners.

    Establishes a connection to the specified remote endpoint.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      void connect(URI uri) throws IOException
      Establishes a connection to the specified remote endpoint.
      Parameters:
      uri - the URI of the remote server to connect to
      Throws:
      IOException - if the connection cannot be established due to a network or I/O error

    • disconnect

      void disconnect() throws IOException
      Terminates the current connection to the remote server.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while closing the connection

    • sendToServer

      void sendToServer(Command cmd) throws IOException
      Sends a command object to the connected remote server.
      Parameters:
      cmd - the Command to be transmitted
      Throws:
      IOException - if sending fails due to a network or I/O problem

    • onCmdFromServer

      void onCmdFromServer(Consumer<Command> cmd)
      Registers a callback that will be invoked whenever a command is received from the server.
      Parameters:
      cmd - consumer that processes incoming Command objects
